title: i'm missing 5000 blue essence to buy yasuo can you give me pls????????
body:
im need 5000 blue essence to buy yasuo can you rent me or give me 
or that im gone go like -6000

replies.body: Hey it looks like you recently unlocked Akali and Poppy which brought your BE down a bit.  If these weren't intentional, your account has[ 3 refund tokens ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ)you can use to return the BE and unlock Yasuo.  I hope that helps!
